title: You Can Make Me Poor
description: Drew Freides of UBS tells Sterling Shea how he's maximizing growth in his ultra high-net-worth practice during the pandemic, and what will change once it's behind us.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Drew Freides of UBS tells Sterling Shea how he's maximizing growth in his ultra high-net-worth practice during the pandemic, and what will change once it's behind us.
